name: Coffee Tree Roastery
address: 2412 Bloor St W, Toronto, ON M6S 1P9
general_desc: Coffee Tree is a warm, spirit-filled cafe and roastery with a deep sense of community. They not only serve good coffee but also donate to many local causes around the city. You can purchase their own roasted beans and explore a variety of coffee-related merch, making it a go-to spot for coffee lovers and supporters of local initiatives.
